|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL256EHT2I-90G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6JB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9287;AR9287-BL1A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Externals=== * 1× Combined FXO (POTS/PSTN, pins 3 and 6) and DSL (pins 4 and 5) :port with 8P8C connector * 1× FXS port (''FON 1'') with 6P4C connector and a discrete component :(apparently) driver (cf. IA3222 and IA3223 for POTS/PSTN port) * 4× Ethernet ports: ** 2× Fast Ethernet (10/100 Mbit/s) ports ** 2× Gigabit Ethernet (10/100/1000 Mbit/s) ports
===Internals=== Two-part plastic clamshell, with 4× T9 screws, 2 to the rear, 2 under the forward :LRF, and one clip center-front. No further tooled disassembly required.
There are 2× U.FL connectors on the cicuit board for the WiFi (not for DECT) antennae.
The device generates at least the following voltages internally: * From the [[Texas Instruments]] TPS65252 buck converter: ** +3.3 V ** +1.05 V * From a buck converter: +1.85 V * From a buck converter: +5 V * From a boost converter: +18.75 V
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.avm.de/fileadmin/user_upload/EN/Manuals/FRITZ_Box/Manual_FRITZBox_7360.pdf Manual (en)] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/avm/avm_fritz_box_7360_v2 ''FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 v2'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *{{fritzbox|7360}} *{{boxmatrix|7360v2}} :mips34_16MB_vdsl_dect441_2eth_2geth_1ab_2usb_host_wlan11n
